name: Lethal Balls Raid
description:
Lethal Balls Raid is a classic arcade shooter, with addictive gameplay.Defend the ground of the planet from the enemy balls.Defeat the bosses and make a highscore.

- Beautiful hand drawn graphics, with bright colors.
- More than 30 enemy sprites, with different movement.
- Lots of weapons to upgrade.
- Special effects like, rain, clouds and thunders.
- Background music (beat) and sound samples.
- Seven big bosses, with unique behavior for each one.
- Easy to control, with keyboard, joypad or mouse.

Controls

- Mouse  ( left , right buttons)

- Keyboard  ( arrows , Ctrl button )

- Joypad  (left analog , right shoulder button )
